nodes.short_description: Titan Isles er et action-adventure skydespil med høj mobilitet, hvor du styrer fire unikke Exo Suits, hver med sin egen kampstil og bevægelsesbeherskelse. Opgrader dine evner, kæmp mod kolossale titaner på øerne, og spil solo eller med op til tre venner i problemfrit 4-spiller co-op.

nodes.long_description:
泰坦岛》是一款动作冒险游戏，要求玩家在压力下移动、随机应变并保持精准。掌握四种不同的外星战衣，升级自己的能力，打倒巨大的泰坦！

# 四种玩法
从四种独特的外星战衣中进行选择，每种战衣都有不同的移动方式、武器和能力。感觉就像在玩四款不同的游戏！在不同任务之间交换战衣，尝试新的移动和战斗方式。

{2580305752350412}1

# 猎杀泰坦
面对主宰战场的巨大、影响世界的泰坦巨人。学会解读它们的攻击，保持机动性，并找到有创意的反击机会。击败每一个泰坦都会解锁强大的升级，并揭示他们觉醒背后的更多奥秘。

{1967604723856199}

# 单人或合作游戏
在单人游戏或最多四人的合作游戏中，尽情展示您击杀泰坦的技能。任务、敌人和奖励会根据团队规模和协调性动态调整。

{1933134257266748}

# 穿越支离破碎的世界
穿越泰坦岛的漂浮废墟--从丛林树冠和熔岩洞穴到暴风肆虐的悬崖和冰冻山峰。每个生物群落都会带来新的穿越挑战，隐藏的奖励等待您去发现。

{2049021332621663}

# 在竞技比赛中测试你的速度
在赛车迷你游戏中测试您的外星战衣技能。与朋友和玩家一较高下，争夺排行榜第一名！

{1236933058627209}
nodes.short_description: 泰坦岛》是一款高机动性动作冒险射击游戏，玩家将驾驶四套独特的外星战衣，每套战衣都有自己的战斗风格和移动技巧。您可以升级自己的能力，在泰坦岛上与巨型泰坦战斗，还可以单人或最多与三位好友进行无缝 4 人合作游戏。

Titan Isles er et action-eventyrskytespill med høy mobilitet der du styrer fire unike Exo-drakter, hver med sin egen kampstil og bevegelsesmestring. Oppgrader evnene dine, kjemp mot kolossale Titans på øyene, og spill alene eller sammen med opptil tre venner i sømløst firespiller-samarbeid.
タイタンアイルズ」は、それぞれ独自の戦闘スタイルと動きを持つ4体のエクソスーツを操る、高機動アクションアドベンチャーシューターです。アビリティをアップグレードし、アイルズ全域で巨大なタイタンと戦おう。ソロプレイはもちろん、最大3人のフレンドとシームレスな4人協力プレイも可能だ。

Titan Isles es un shooter de acción y aventura de alta movilidad en el que pilotas cuatro Exo Suits únicos, cada uno con su propio estilo de combate y dominio del movimiento. Mejora tus habilidades, lucha contra titanes colosales por las islas y juega en solitario o con hasta tres amigos en el modo cooperativo para 4 jugadores.

Titan Isles este un shooter de aventură și acțiune de mare mobilitate în care pilotezi patru Exo Suits unice, fiecare cu propriul stil de luptă și stăpânire a mișcării. Îmbunătățește-ți abilitățile, luptă-te cu titani colosali prin Isles și joacă solo sau cu până la trei prieteni în modul cooperativ perfect pentru 4 jucători.

Titan Isles ist ein hochmobiler Action-Adventure-Shooter, in dem Sie vier einzigartige Exo-Anzüge steuern, jeder mit seinem eigenen Kampfstil und seiner eigenen Bewegungsfähigkeit. Verbessere deine Fähigkeiten, kämpfe gegen kolossale Titanen auf den Inseln und spiele allein oder mit bis zu drei Freunden im nahtlosen 4-Spieler-Koop-Modus.

Titan Isles to przygodowa strzelanka akcji o wysokiej mobilności, w której pilotujesz cztery unikalne kombinezony Exo, każdy z własnym stylem walki i mistrzostwem ruchu. Ulepszaj swoje umiejętności, walcz z kolosalnymi tytanami na wyspach i graj solo lub z maksymalnie trzema znajomymi w płynnym trybie kooperacji dla 4 graczy.

Titan Isles é um jogo de tiro de ação e aventura de alta mobilidade em que você pilota quatro Exo Suits exclusivos, cada um com seu próprio estilo de combate e domínio de movimento. Aprimore suas habilidades, lute contra titãs colossais nas ilhas e jogue sozinho ou com até três amigos no modo cooperativo para quatro jogadores.

Titan Isles är en action- och äventyrsskjutare med hög rörlighet där du styr fyra unika Exo Suits, var och en med sin egen stridsstil och rörelseförmåga. Uppgradera dina förmågor, slåss mot kolossala titaner över öarna och spela solo eller med upp till tre vänner i sömlöst 4-spelar co-op.

Titan Isles - это приключенческий шутер с высокой мобильностью, в котором вам предстоит управлять четырьмя уникальными экзокостюмами, каждый из которых обладает собственным стилем боя и мастерством передвижения. Улучшайте свои способности, сражайтесь с колоссальными Титанами на островах и играйте в одиночку или с тремя друзьями в бесшовном кооперативном режиме для 4 игроков.

nodes.long_description:
# FROSTFALL ENVELOPES TOSKA - A unique race track and present-hunt challenge are now available for a limited time!

Take down colossal Titans as you battle to stop the end of the world! Uncover the mystery of their awakening as you soar across a massive, fractured landscape in one of four powerful, upgradable and heavily armed Exo Suits! Play solo or in 4-player co-op with cross-play!


# FOUR WAYS TO PLAY
Select from four unique Exo Suits, each with distinct movement styles, weapons, and abilities. It feels like playing four different games! Swap suits between missions to experiment with new ways to move and fight.
{676916538133383}

# HUNT THE TITANS
Face immense, world-shaping Titans that dominate the battlefield. Learn to read their attacks, stay mobile, & find creative openings to strike back. Defeating each Titan unlocks powerful upgrades & reveals more of the mystery behind their awakening.
{25436434685974263}

# PLAY SOLO OR IN CO-OP
Show off your Titan-slaying skills in single player or in drop-in, drop-out co-op with up to four players. Missions, enemies, and rewards scale dynamically to match your team’s size and coordination.
{1550709172961091}

# FIGHT ACROSS A FRACTURED WORLD
Traverse the floating ruins of Titan Isles - from jungle canopies and molten caverns to storm-torn cliffs and frozen peaks. Each biome offers new traversal challenges & hidden rewards waiting to be discovered.
{1397567897979983}

# TEST YOUR SPEED IN COMPETITIVE RACING
Put your Exo Suit skills to the test in racing minigames. Compete with friends & players for the top of the leaderboards!

{1871462160435110}
nodes.short_description: Titan Isles is a high-mobility action-adventure shooter where you pilot four unique Exo Suits, each with its own combat style and movement mastery. Upgrade your abilities, battle colossal Titans across the Isles, and play solo or with up to three friends in seamless 4-player co-op.

Titan Isles, her biri kendi savaş stiline ve hareket ustalığına sahip dört benzersiz Exo Suit'e pilotluk yaptığınız yüksek hareket kabiliyetli bir aksiyon-macera nişancı oyunudur. Yeteneklerinizi yükseltin, Adalar boyunca devasa Titanlarla savaşın ve tek başınıza ya da sorunsuz 4 oyunculu co-op modunda üç arkadaşınızla birlikte oynayın.

Titan Isles est un jeu d'action-aventure d'une grande mobilité dans lequel vous pilotez quatre Exo Suits uniques, chacune ayant son propre style de combat et sa propre maîtrise des mouvements. Améliorez vos capacités, affrontez des Titans colossaux à travers les îles et jouez en solo ou avec jusqu'à trois amis en coopération transparente à 4 joueurs.

nodes.long_description:
# FROSTFALL ENVELOPES TOSKA - A unique race track and present-hunt challenge are now available for a limited time!

Take down colossal Titans as you battle to stop the end of the world! Uncover the mystery of their awakening as you soar across a massive, fractured landscape in one of four powerful, upgradable and heavily armed Exo Suits! Play solo or in 4-player co-op with cross-play!

# FOUR WAYS TO PLAY
Select from four unique Exo Suits, each with distinct movement styles, weapons, and abilities. It feels like playing four different games! Swap suits between missions to experiment with new ways to move and fight.

{766913166425460}

# HUNT THE TITANS
Face immense, world-shaping Titans that dominate the battlefield. Learn to read their attacks, stay mobile, & find creative openings to strike back. Defeating each Titan unlocks powerful upgrades & reveals more of the mystery behind their awakening.

{1384909409981626}

# PLAY SOLO OR IN CO-OP
Show off your Titan-slaying skills in single player or in drop-in, drop-out co-op with up to four players. Missions, enemies, and rewards scale dynamically to match your team’s size and coordination.

{902415172961482}

# FIGHT ACROSS A FRACTURED WORLD
Traverse the floating ruins of Titan Isles - from jungle canopies and molten caverns to storm-torn cliffs and frozen peaks. Each biome offers new traversal challenges & hidden rewards waiting to be discovered.

{2016508809170455}

# TEST YOUR SPEED IN COMPETITIVE RACING
Put your Exo Suit ski

{1623896788960397}
nodes.short_description: Titan Isles is a high-mobility action-adventure shooter where you pilot four unique Exo Suits, each with its own combat style and movement mastery. Upgrade your abilities, battle colossal Titans across the Isles, and play solo or with up to three friends in seamless 4-player co-op.
Acción rápida y cooperativa mientras luchas contra titanes colosales en islas.

Το Titan Isles είναι ένα shooter περιπέτειας δράσης υψηλής κινητικότητας, στο οποίο πιλοτάρετε τέσσερις μοναδικές Exo Suits, η καθεμία με το δικό της στυλ μάχης και τη δική της ικανότητα κίνησης. Αναβαθμίστε τις ικανότητές σας, πολεμήστε κολοσσιαίους Τιτάνες σε όλα τα Νησιά και παίξτε μόνοι σας ή με έως και τρεις φίλους σε απρόσκοπτη συνεργασία 4 παικτών.

Titan Isles je akční adventura s vysokou pohyblivostí, ve které pilotujete čtyři unikátní exo obleky, z nichž každý má vlastní styl boje a pohybové dovednosti. Vylepšujte své schopnosti, bojujte s kolosálními Titány napříč ostrovy a hrajte sólo nebo až se třemi přáteli v plynulé kooperaci pro 4 hráče.
타이탄 아일즈는 기동성이 뛰어난 액션 어드벤처 슈팅 게임으로, 각각 고유한 전투 스타일과 움직임 숙련도를 지닌 4가지 엑소 슈트를 조종하는 게임입니다. 능력을 업그레이드하고, 아일스 전역의 거대한 타이탄과 전투를 벌이고, 혼자 또는 최대 3명의 친구와 함께 원활한 4인 협동 플레이를 즐기세요.

Titan Isles là một tựa game bắn súng hành động phiêu lưu có tính di động cao, nơi bạn sẽ điều khiển bốn bộ giáp Exo Suits độc đáo, mỗi bộ có phong cách chiến đấu và kỹ năng di chuyển riêng biệt. Nâng cấp khả năng của bạn, chiến đấu với những Titan khổng lồ trên các hòn đảo, và chơi một mình hoặc cùng tối đa ba người bạn trong chế độ hợp tác 4 người chơi mượt mà.

Titan Isles é um jogo de ação e aventura de alta mobilidade onde pilotas quatro Exo Suits únicos, cada um com o seu próprio estilo de combate e mestria de movimentos. Melhora as tuas capacidades, combate Titãs colossais nas Ilhas e joga a solo ou com até três amigos em modo cooperativo para 4 jogadores.
Titan Isles 是一款高機動性的動作冒險射擊遊戲，您可以駕駛四套獨特的 Exo 戰衣，每套戰衣都有自己的戰鬥方式和移動技巧。升級您的能力，在泰坦島上與巨大的泰坦戰鬥，並單獨遊戲或與多達三位好友進行無縫 4 人合作。

Titan Isles è uno sparatutto d'azione e avventura ad alta mobilità in cui si pilotano quattro Exo Suit unici, ognuno con un proprio stile di combattimento e una propria padronanza dei movimenti. Potenziate le vostre abilità, combattete contro colossali Titani attraverso le isole e giocate da soli o con un massimo di tre amici in modalità cooperativa a 4 giocatori.

Titan Isles on erittäin liikkuva toimintaseikkailuräiskintäpeli, jossa ohjaat neljää ainutlaatuista Exo-pukua, joista jokaisella on oma taistelutyylinsä ja liikkumismahdollisuutensa. Päivitä kykyjäsi, taistele kolossaalisia titaaneja vastaan eri puolilla saaria ja pelaa yksin tai jopa kolmen ystäväsi kanssa saumattomassa neljän pelaajan yhteistyöpelissä.
Titan Isles 是一款高機動性的動作冒險射擊遊戲，您可以駕駛四套獨特的 Exo 戰衣，每套戰衣都有自己的戰鬥方式和移動技巧。升級您的能力，在泰坦島上與巨大的泰坦戰鬥，並單獨遊戲或與多達三位好友進行無縫 4 人合作。

Titan Isles is een zeer beweeglijke action-adventure shooter waarin je vier unieke Exo Suits bestuurt, elk met een eigen vechtstijl en bewegingsbeheersing. Upgrade je vaardigheden, neem het op tegen kolossale Titans over de Isles en speel solo of met maximaal drie vrienden in naadloze co-op voor 4 spelers.

nodes.long_description:
# **BATTLE TITANS - WITH FRIENDS OR ALONE**

Set on the broken world of Toska, shattered to ruins by the mysterious awakening of giant Titans, you - the player, are cast into an epic struggle for survival and revenge.

# **USE POWERFUL EXO SUITS**
{1182808979868801}
Before launching into each mission, you’ll choose from one of four Exo Suits, each providing it's own unique traversal equipment and weapons.

# **PLAY ALONE OR WITH FRIENDS**
{658737879847254}
The full game can be enjoyed as a single player campaign or you can invite your friends in up-to 4-player co-op.

# **UNCOVER THE SECRETS OF THE TITANS**
{565889143140523}
It's up to you and your team to locate and defeat the Titans, along the way you'll uncover the motivations and secrets behind the existence of the Titans and their destructive attack on the world of Toska.


# **TRAVERSE A PLETHORA OF ENVIRONMENTS**
{1282405879494333}
As you progress, you'll discover the many different biomes that together, form the vibrant world of Titan Isles.
nodes.short_description: Battle swarming robots and colossal machines either alone or with friends across a fractured world of floating islands and breathtaking vistas.

nodes.change_log:
- Hosting public rooms now doesn't require entering a room code
- Added workaround for PSVR2 on Steam (-psvr2 command line arg)
- Added particles to collectable targets
- Fixed fog & lighting issues on some winter themed scenery
- Fixed Enforcers not moving in a campaign 8 encounter
- Improved alignment of loading screen
- Fixed snow inside caves
- Fixed zipline alignment issues
- Fixed audio stopping when moving away from radio towers
- Multiple other minor fixes and quality of life improvements
